alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Western Chesterfield; Western Hanover; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 14 at 2:44PM EST until January 17 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph Sunday afternoon and evening. * WHERE...Caroline, Western Hanover, Western Chesterfield and Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) Counties. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will initially begin as snow before quickly mixing with sleet and rain later Sunday and Sunday night. Snow could fall heavily at times Sunday afternoon before this changeover occurs.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Caroline; Western Chesterfield; Western Hanover; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond)
